Not commenting on the plot or tags, but in pure terms of art quality, this is a superb piece of media. The shading is consistently great, giving depth to each scene and really just carrying this doujin onto a completely different level. The amount of detail is insane, so much commitment for seemingly mundane details. (just look at that hand on page 39, from the latex creases to the fluids to the fucking arm hair, its ridiculous). Facial expressions, poses: Chef's kiss, page 40 became an instant favorite for me. Not to mention the MC herself, what a great character design. Perfectly strikes that balance between cute and sexy you wanna see in anime high school characters. Every expression of her just screams "fuck me hard, please", even the ones with her mask on. If this was colored and uncensored, I would have printed that shit as soon as i was back at the office. It was just delightful to look at, even post-nut.
But the crowd on page 44 was probably 3D-rendered. Therefore 7/10 for art.
